resources.name: get system state
resources.description:
## Description
This method allows the admin to get the system state

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"status": 1
}
```

resources.name: suspend service
resources.description:
## !Important
Used in case of emergency or maintenance

## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Admins

## Description
This method allows the admin to suspend all the public (not administrative) system. So users will not be able to see events and buy, use and transfer tickets.

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"message": "System suspended"
}
```

resources.name: is token valid
resources.description:
## Description
This method is used to check if a stored token is still valid

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"message": "Valid oken"
}
```

### Error 401 - Unauthorized
```response:401
{
	"message": "Invalid token"
}
```

resources.name: validate account
resources.description:
## Method triggered when clicking on an email button

## Description
A las cuentas de los usuarios no pueden interactuar con las funciones de "usaurio" hasta que no hayan verificado su correo electronico.

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"message": "account validated
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Found
```response:404
{
	"message": "invalid validation code"
}
```

resources.name: request validation account token
resources.description:
## Method triggered when clicking on an email button

A las cuentas de los usuarios no pueden interactuar con las funciones de "usaurio" hasta que no hayan verificado su correo electronico.

## Responses

```response:200

	"message": "validation code sent to email"
}
```

### Error 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"message": "validation code sent to email"
}
```

resources.name: sign in
google sign in
resources.description:
## Description
This method will create a user if it's not registered.
If successful this method will return a token that shall be stored on the client

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"id": "14573637-3b75-40a9-9289-c1219bbdc012",
	"name": "CARLOS",
	"email": "00058820@uca.edu.sv",
	"avatar": "avatar1.jpg",
	"roles": [],
	"token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIwMDA1ODgyMEB1Y2EuZWR1LnN2IiwiaWF0IjoxNjg3MjkxNzE5LCJleHAiOjE2ODg1ODc3MTl9.Kkekr5xgE57OrnNF9JlstrcV-pY185COHIufbEoKojI"
}
```


### Errors 401 - Unauthorized
```response:401
{
	"message": "invalid credentials"
}
```

resources.name: get events
get event by id
get event by category
get event by state
create event
update event
change event status
resources.description:
## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Admins

## Description
Los administradores pueden cambiar el estado de un evento, ya sea para que el publico no pueda ver informacion sobre ese evento hasta un determinado momento o para detener las compras de tickets en caso de alguna eventualidad.

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"message": "status changed"
}
```

### Error 400 - Bad Request
```response:400
{
	"eventId": [
		"event id is required"
	],
	"statusId": [
		"event new status is required"
	]
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Foud
```response:404
{
	"message": "Event not found"
}
```

```response:404
{
	"message": "event state not found"
}

```

resources.name: assign sponsor to event
remove sponsor from event
get tiers by event
create tier for event
update tier for event
resources.description:
## Important!
When updating the capacity of an event, it cannot be reduced by more than the number of tickets sold so far.

## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Admins

## Description
Este metodo permite que una tier o localidad pueda ser modificada, sin embargo, si se reduce la capacidad de una localidad esta no se puede reducir en menor cantidad que el numero de tickets que ya fueron vendidos.

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"message": "Tier updated"
}
```

### Error 400 - Bad Request
```response:400
{
	"price": [
		"price must be a positive number"
	],
	"name": [
		"name is required"
	],
	"capacity": [
		"capacity must be a positive number"
	]
}
```

### Error 409 - Conflict
```response:409
{
	"message": "more tickets have been sold than the new capacity",
	"soldTickets": 2
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Found
```response:404
{
	"message": "Tier not found"
}
```

resources.name: delete tier for event
resources.description:
## Important!
This method should only work in a event tier which has no tickets sold.

## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Admins

## Description
En caso de que se cree una tier innecesaria esta podrá ser eliminada por el administrador siempre y cuando no se hayan vendido tickets de esta localidad.

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"message": "Tier deleted"
}
```

### Error 409 - Conflict
```response:409
{
	"message": "more tickets have been sold than the new capacity",
	"soldTickets": 2
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Found
```response:404
{
	"message": "Tier not found"
}
```

resources.name: get place
create place

get ticket by id
get tickets by user
create ticket
resources.description:
## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Users

## Description
Si el proceso de compra es exitoso y hay disponibilidad de tickets se creara un nuevo ticket para el usuario en cuestion.

## Responses
### Success 201 - Created
```response:201
{
	"message": "ticket created"
}
```

### Error 400 - Bad Request
```response:400
{
	"tierId": [
		"tier id is required"
	]
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Found
```response:404
{
	"message": "tier not found"
}
```

### Error 409 - Conflict
```response:409
{
	"message": "event tier is sold out"
}
```

resources.name: generate code to use ticket
resources.description:
## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Users (owner of the ticket)

## Description
Cuando un usuario quiere cambiar un ticket el dia de un evento, genera un registro que tiene una validez de 10 min. En este intervalo de tiempo un "colaborador" debe de escanear el ticket para validarlo.

Este metodo devolvera un codigo con el que se generara el codigo QR.

## Responses
### Success 201 - Created
```response:201
{
	"code": "87a43ec1-2374-4f7d-b383-bbbd03a4b09b"
}
```

### Error 400 - Bad Request
```response:400
{
	"ticketId": [
		"ticket id is required"
	]
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Found
```response:404
{
	"message": "ticket not found"
}
```

### Error 409 - Conflict
```response:409
{
	"message": "ticket has already been validated"
}
```

resources.name: validate ticket
resources.description:
## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Collaborators

## Description
Si el registro a validar esta en el rango de tiempo estipulado se firmara la validacion del ticket con la hora a la que el usuario ingreso al evento. Y ya no se podra utilizar el ticket en cuestion.

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"message": "ticket successfully validated"
}
```

### Error 400 - Bad Request
```response:400
{
	"verificationToken": [
		"verification token is required"
	]
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Found
```response:404
{
	"message": "invalid verification code"
}
```

### Error 409 - Conflict
```response:409
{
	"message": "ticket has already been validated"
}
```

```response:409
{
	"message": "verification code is expired"
}
```

resources.name: start transfer ticket
resources.description:
## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Users (owner)

## Description
Cuando un usuario quiere recibir un ticket de parte de otro usuario crea esta solicitud. generara un codigo que debera ser escaneado por el usuario que entregara el boleto. Esta solicitud tiene un maximo de 10 min para ser contestada.

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"code": "479dfea9-2b55-46f2-8dfc-df103d103ff4"
}
```

### Error 400 - Bad Request
```response:400
{
	"toId": [
		"receiver is required"
	]
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Found
```response:404
{
	"message": "user not found"
}
```

resources.name: accept transfer ticket
finish transfer ticket
general stats
resources.description:
## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Admins

## Description
Los administradores pueden solicitar informacion estadistica del systema en general.

### Variables:
- cantidad de usuarios
- eventos creados
- tickets vendidos
- total de asistencias a eventos
- porcentaje de asistencia (individual vs grupos)

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"users": 2,
	"events": 1,
	"ticketsSold": 2,
	"attendants": 1,
	"attendanceSingleVsGroup": [
		100.0,
		0.0
	]
}
```

resources.name: event general stats
resources.description:
## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Admins

## Description
Los administradores pueden solicitar informacion estadistica de un evento es especifico.

### Variables:
- capacidad total del evento
- tickets vendidos
- porcentaje de tickets vendidos respecto a la totalidad de cupos disponibles
- cantidad de personas que asistieron al evento
- porcentaje de asistencia respecto a la totalidad de tickets vendidos
- porcentaje de asistencia (individual vs grupos)

### Variables para charts
- listado de tiers
- numero de tickets vendidos por cada tier
- intervalos de horas de entrada
- numero de personas que ingresaron a esa hora

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"capacity": 4,
	"ticketsSold": 2,
	"soldVsAvailable": 50.0,
	"attendants": 1,
	"attendantsVsTicketsSold": 50.0,
	"attendanceSingleVsGroup": [
		100.0,
		0.0
	],
	"tiers": [
		"La playa ULTRA VIP",
		"La playa a secas"
	],
	"ticketsSoldByTier": [
		1,
		1
	],
	"attendanceHours": [
		"11:00 - 12:00"
	],
	"attendanceValues": [
		1
	]
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Found
```response:404
{
	"message": "event not found"
}
```

resources.name: event attendance stats
resources.description:
## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Collaborators

## Description
Los colaboradores podran ver la proporcion de gente que ya ingreso a un evento vs la totalidad de tickets vendidos.

### Variables:
- capacidad total del evento
- tickets vendidos
- porcentaje de tickets vendidos respecto a la totalidad de cupos disponibles
- cantidad de personas que asistieron al evento
- porcentaje de asistencia respecto a la totalidad de tickets vendidos

## Responses
### Success 200 - OK
```response:200
{
	"capacity": 4,
	"ticketsSold": 2,
	"soldVsAvailable": 50.0,
	"attendants": 1,
	"attendantsVsTicketsSold": 0.0
}
```

### Error 404 - Not Found
```response:404
{
	"message": "event not found"
}
```

resources.name: generate sales report
resources.description:
## Auth token required
### Shall be used by:
- Admins

## Description
Los administradores pueden solicitar reportes en PDF.
